html:
Dec 16 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Abrdn, Euronext and Sodexo, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* Euronext NV ENX.PA: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Jumbo SA BABr.AT: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Sodexo EXHO.PA: RBC raises to sector perform from underperform

* Solaria SLRS.MC: Credit Suisse initiates coverage with outperform rating

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Aalberts NV AALB.AS: Berenberg initiates coverage with buy rating and PT of EUR 80

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to 275p from 320p

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* Acticor Biotech Sas ALACT.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux initiates coverage with buy rating

* Acticor Biotech Sas ALACT.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux initiates coverage with PT of EUR 9.50

* Adevinta ASA ADEA.OL: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to NOK 160 from NOK 175

* Allfunds Group Plc ALLFG.AS: Jefferies initiates coverage with buy rating

* Allfunds Group Plc ALLFG.AS: Jefferies initiates coverage with target price EUR 19

* Alphawave IP Group Plc AWE.L: JP Morgan cuts target price to 311p from 450p

* Anglo American AAL.L: Morgan Stanley cuts target price to 2870p from 3070p

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Barclays cuts target price to 1050p from 1100p

* Arbonia AG ARBNO.S: Stifel raises target price to CHF 21.50 from CHF 21

* Aroundtown SA AT1.DE: Citigroup Re-Establishes coverage with buy rating

* Aroundtown SA AT1.DE: Citigroup Re-Establishes coverage with target price EUR 7.65

* AstraZeneca AZN.L: Morgan Stanley raises target price to 10,200p from 10,000p

* Bawag Group AG BAWG.VI: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 72 from EUR 67

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Liberum raises target price to 5100p from 4450p

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Liberum raises to buy from hold

* BHP BHPB.L: BMO raises target price to 2600p from 2400p

* Bunzl BNZL.L: Citigroup raises price target to 3300p from 3100p

* Bunzl BNZL.L: Peel Hunt cuts to add from buy; raises target price to 3,200p from 2,800p

* Bunzl BNZL.L: Stifel raises target price to 3,176p from 2,700p

* Carl Zeiss Meditec AG AFXG.DE: HSBC raises target price to EUR 184 from EUR 164

* Carl Zeiss Meditec AG AFXG.DE: HSBC raises to hold from reduce

* Ceres Power Holdings Plc CWR.L:Credit Suisse initiates coverage with outperform rating

* Ceres Power Holdings Plc CWR.L:Credit Suisse initiates coverage with PT 1,450p

* CFE CFEB.BR: Berenberg raises target price to EUR 130 from EUR 100

* CFE CFEB.BR: Berenberg raises to buy from hold

* Compagnie Plastic Omnium SE PLOF.PA: Stifel cuts target price to EUR 25 from EUR 30

* Compass CPG.L: RBC raises target price to 1340p from 1225p

* Crest Nicholson Holdings Plc CRST.L: Liberum raises target price to 445p from 435p

* Daimler Truck Holding AG DTGGe.DE: Barclays initiates with overweight rating

* Daimler Truck Holding AG DTGGe.DE: Barclays initiates with target price EUR 43

* DFS Furniture Plc DFSD.L: UBS cuts target price to 241p from 250p

* Domino's Pizza Group Plc DOM.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* DSV DSV.CO: JP Morgan raises target price to DKK 1823 from DKK 1782

* Dunelm Group Plc DNLM.L: UBS raises target price to 1750p from 1300p

* Dunelm Group Plc DNLM.L: UBS raises to buy from neutral

* Edpr EDPR.LS: Credit Suisse initiates coverage with neutral rating; PT EUR 22

* Euronext NV ENX.PA: HSBC raises target price to EUR 104 from EUR 102

* Euronext NV ENX.PA: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Foresight Group Holdings Ltd FSGF.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 550p from 495p

* Fresnillo Plc FRES.L: BMO cuts target price to 1150p from 1200p

* Generali GASI.MI: Berenberg cuts target price to EUR 22.70 from EUR 23.40

* Glencore GLEN.L: BMO raises target price to 400p from 380p

* Greek Organisation of Football Prognostics SA OPAr.AT: HSBC raises PT to EUR 16.5 from EUR 16

* H&M HMb.ST: Independent Research cuts PT to SEK 170.00 from SEK 185.00; rating hold

* Hapag Lloyd AG HLAG.DE: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 155.55 from EUR 142.6

* Hochschild HOCM.L: BMO cuts target price to 160p from 170p

* Howden Joinery HWDN.L: UBS raises target price to 1000p from 960p

* Hummingbird Resources Plc HUMR.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 14p from 24p

* Ideagen Plc IDEA.L: Canaccord Genuity raises target price to 365p from 350p

* Inditex ITX.MC: Independent Research cuts PT to EUR 29.00 from EUR 30.00; rating hold

* Informa INF.L: Credit Suisse raises target price to 673p from 635p

* ITM Power Plc ITM.L: Credit Suisse initiates with underperform rating;PT 340p

* Jumbo SA BABr.AT: HSBC raises target price to EUR 17.5

* Jumbo SA BABr.AT: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Kape Technologies Plc KAPE.L: Stifel raises target price to 569p from 566p

* Kingfisher KGF.L: UBS initiates coverage with neutral rating; target price 338p

* Kuehne Und Nagel International AG KNIN.S: JP Morgan cuts PT to CHF 293 from CHF 305.6

* McBride Plc MCB.L: Peel Hunt cuts target price to 75p from 85p

* Nel ASA NEL.OL: Credit Suisse initiates coverage with neutral rating; PT NOK 19.3

* Neste Oyj NESTE.HE: Cowen and Company cuts target price to EUR 41 from EUR 44

* Norrhydro Group OYJ NORRH.HE: Inderes raises to reduce from sell; target price EUR 3.60

* NOS SA NOS.LS: Morgan Stanley cuts target price to EUR 3 from EUR 3.60

* NOS SA NOS.LS: Morgan Stanley cuts to underweight from equal weight

* ON the Beach Group Plc OTB.L: Liberum cuts target price to 250p from 380p

* Ontex Group NV ONTEX.BR: JP Morgan cuts target price to EUR 7.50 from EUR 8.50

* Petra Diamonds PDL.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 83p from 96p

* Pfeiffer Vacuum PV.DE: Stifel initiates coverage with hold rating; PT EUR 207

* RWS Holdings Plc RWS.L: Canaccord Genuity cuts target price to 745p from 750p

* Scatec ASA SCATC.OL: Kepler Cheuvreux reinitiates coverage with buy rating

* Scatec ASA SCATC.OL: Kepler Cheuvreux reinitiates coverage with target price NOK 185

* Shurgard Self Storage SA SHUR.BR: UBS raises target price to EUR 65 from EUR 52

* Sodexo EXHO.PA: RBC raises target price to EUR 84 from EUR 65

* Sodexo EXHO.PA: RBC raises to sector perform from underperform

* Solaria SLRS.MC: Credit Suisse initiates coverage with outperform rating

* Solaria SLRS.MC: Credit Suisse initiates coverage with target price EUR 21

* Solaria SLRS.MC: RBC raises target price to EUR 18 from EUR 17

* Solaria SLRS.MC: RBC raises to sector perform from underperform

* South32 Ltd S32.L: BMO raises target price to 220p from 210p

* Tharisa Plc THST.L: Peel Hunt cuts target price to 225p from 230p

* Unicredit CRDI.MI: Berenberg raises target price to EUR 17 from EUR 12.10

* Victoria Plc VCP.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 1400p from 1150p

* Vonovia SE VNAn.DE: Deutsche Bank resumes coverage with buy rating and PT of EUR 65
